Articles.Content:
Seems like still not working.

Gonna check the install later and see if I did anything wrong.

Thanks to @blowfish I found my mistake, I forgot to change a reference and was still using MacOS librairies.

This version should work : http://nexus.amis.tv/repository/maven-snapshots/tv/amis/pamynx/ksp-civilian-population-mod/2.1.2-SNAPSHOT/ksp-civilian-population-mod-2.1.2-20180606.215629-3.zip

Could you try and give me a confirmation ?

1 hour ago, Pamynx said:

Thanks to @blowfish I found my mistake, I forgot to change a reference and was still using MacOS librairies.

This version should work : http://nexus.amis.tv/repository/maven-snapshots/tv/amis/pamynx/ksp-civilian-population-mod/2.1.2-SNAPSHOT/ksp-civilian-population-mod-2.1.2-20180606.215629-3.zip

Could you try and give me a confirmation ?

Lol no problem. Gonna try it later when i get home.

YAY. VESSEL DETECTED.

futhur testing the fundraising ability

TEST SUCCESS

What do the tweakables mean? Does showing "ALLOW CONTRACTORS" means that civilians will automatically come or vice versa?
You will have to click the button to allow contractors. Once done, you should see a mission status on the description of the vessel.

ah thanks a lot.

what about the breeding stuff?
unfortunately there is this bug where launching a craft will reset the kerbal timer. Which means I have to focus at the tracking station or the craft itself to gain any civilians
and also i cannot see the crew when they are added to the station.
seems like something about Key not found in the alt F12 menu

Now i can see the crew after switching back to it.

Pregnency test in SERIOUS PROGRESS (a.k.a. timewrap)

Found a correlation. During the time in VAB and launch, if i do not switch to tracking stations, the ship detection/info screen does not show stuff.

Probably due to a KeyNotFoundException.

Also, the names in the crew part of the tab is misaligned

What will happen when kerbals fill up a ship but thry have to give birth?

There is a button to allow / forbid breeding, just like for the contractors.
I will double check for the reset of the contractor timer, it should not be reset upon launch.
Crew are created by the game only if the vessel is focus, but, as you noticed, you will see the happy face only if the crew exists on loading of the ship.
Could you provide me more information (a screenshot for example) about this "key not found" stuff, I do not understand.
There is indeed some rework need on the GUI, more then just aligning names.
If there is a birth but no room for the baby, the baby is lost.
Im not sure, will upload another log if i can find the appdata file on my computer.
so does my reputation decreases if any baby is aborted?

1 hour ago, Xd the great said:

so does my reputation decreases if any baby is aborted?

Nope

9 minutes ago, Pamynx said:

Nope

Yay. 

By the way, the babies and children look like adults.

Edited June 9, 2018 by Xd the great

4 minutes ago, Xd the great said:

Yay. 

By the way, the babies and children look like adults.

Yep... I have no graphical talent

Oh dont mind. Giving birth to full grown adult is fun.

Also, can you make the UI crew searching function to inculde searching by vessel?

Also, i believe that the mod makes me lag for every few seconds, no matter the graphics. Not a big lag, just 0.25s, but it is quite annoying.

In the crew UI, the filter is for any field. So if you type the name of a vessel, the crew will be filterd on this vessel.

Also I exeprimented this little freeze. In order to avoid it I modified the addon so that it only will only activate once every hour. Such a freeze should now be perceptible at high warp speed. Can you try this new version and confirm the freeze is not a problem any more ?

http://nexus.amis.tv/repository/maven-snapshots/tv/amis/pamynx/ksp-civilian-population-mod/2.1.2-SNAPSHOT/ksp-civilian-population-mod-2.1.2-20180610.160506-4.zip

Thanks !
More testing on the way
Nope, still laggy...
And apparently the longer i run the game there more frequent and laggy it becomes.

Working on it, I have several ideas but I want to be sure I reproduce this lag caused by CivilianPopulation before making modifications and kill it.

How much kerbals and ships are you playing with ? Are you playing with many part mods ? Do you think I could use your saved game ?

I am not done yet but this version should improve performances :

http://nexus.amis.tv/repository/maven-snapshots/tv/amis/pamynx/ksp-civilian-population-mod/2.1.2-SNAPSHOT/ksp-civilian-population-mod-2.1.2-20180612.220907-5.zip
